snippet: Security authorities have arrested 62 militants accused of having ties to terrorists in Yemen and Syria and who are suspected of planning attacks on government installations.
abstract: Saudi Arabian security authorities arrest 62 militants accused of having ties to terrorists in Yemen and Syria and suspected of planning attacks on government installations and foreign interests and of plotting assassinations.
lead_paragraph: Security authorities have arrested 62 militants accused of having ties to terrorists in Yemen and Syria and who are suspected of planning attacks on government installations.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: 62 Accused of Ties to Yemeni and Syrian Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: 62 Accused of Ties to Yemeni and Syrian Terrorists
